archimate:BusinessService.name: Financial Accounting
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
The corporate financial reports are assembled to schedule for accounting and general reporting needs
General comment:
This service domain handles the posting of business activity to the bank's financial accounts. These will typically be double entry ledgers and can include multiple levels of consolidation (sub-ledgers) The financial accounts conform to chart of accounts and appropriate GAP rules and are rolled up into the GL as part of the financial statements
Business Purpose : Financial booking of all business activity in an ledger/sub-ledger accounting structure/hierarchy according to the appropriate chart of accounts
Пример использования:
Корпоративные финансовые отчеты собираются в соответствии с графиком для нужд бухгалтерского учета и общей отчетности
Общее замечание:
Этот домен услуг обрабатывает учет деловой активности на финансовых счетах банка. Как правило, это регистры двойной записи, они могут включать несколько уровней консолидации (субкниги). финансовые счета соответствуют плану счетов и соответствующим правилам разрыва и сворачиваются в ГК как часть финансовых отчетов
деловая цель _Бух_проводки_ всей бизнес_деятельности в структуре/иерархии бухгалтерской книги/субкниги согласно соответствующему плану счетов
Financial Accounting This service domain handles the posting of business activity to the bank's financial accounts. These will typically be double entry ledgers and can include multiple levels of consolidation (sub-ledgers) The financial accounts conform to the bank's chart of accounts and appropriate GAP rules and are rolled up into the GL as part of the financial statements
Detailed Summary This service domain handles financial booking of all business activity in a ledger/sub-ledger accounting structure/hierarchy according to the appropriate chart of accounts
Executive Summary This service domain handles financial booking of all business activity in a ledger/sub-ledger accounting structure/hierarchy according to the appropriate chart of accounts
Examples Of Use A business unit posts its financial transactions to the sub ledger at the end of the working day
